original_title: 妻は元同僚たちの共同性処理玩具 幸せな生活を壊し始めた、清楚な妻の中に刻み込まれたドMの刻印 真宮あや
overview: Aya, a former clerk at a major electronics company, now lives as a full-time housewife. However, she had a secret to Aya. That is, when she was a clerk, she was played with by male employees. One day, while her husband is away, Hirai, who was the leader of the men who used to have Aya, visits. "It's about time your body began to ache, right?" Hirai approached with a gloomy smile. Aya couldn't escape from her past self, which she should have thrown away, and allowed her body...
title: Together with Former Coworkers, A Wife Relieves Her Sexual Urges with Toys Inside This Neat and Clean Wife Are Secret Masochistic Desires That Will Shatter Her Happy Family Life Aya Mamiya
